attributes.action: Give the man who runs freesciencelessons.com a knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
His Youtube is freesciencelessons.com
Show some support
attributes.background: This man has helped many suffering GCSE students and aided revision in ways that the textbooks simply are unable to do.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
